template.name: Organism_Protein
template.title: Organism --> All proteins.
template.longDescription: Show all the proteins from a particular organism.

query.name: Organism_Protein
query.longDescription: Show all the proteins from a particular organism.

constraint.description: Show all the proteins from the organism:

template.name: Gene_Protein
template.title: Gene --> Proteins.
template.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene.

query.name: Gene_Protein
query.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene.

template.name: All_Proteins_In_Organism_To_Publications
template.title: All proteins in organism --> Publications.
template.longDescription: Show the publications for each gene in one organism. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

query.name: All_Proteins_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.primaryAccession Protein.organism.name Protein.publications.firstAuthor Protein.publications.title Protein.publications.year Protein.publications.journal Protein.publications.volume Protein.publications.pages Protein.publications.pubMedId
